definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Also, sharing lipsticks is another way that makeup can cause health problems.
sentences.chinese: 此外，与别人共用口红也会导致健康问题。

sentences.english: Go all out with a lace dress and vampy lipstick for a Saturday night out.
sentences.chinese: 星期六晚上，穿上花边礼服，涂上vampy口红。

sentences.english: He came home with lipstick on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他回家时脸上还带着口红印呢。

sentences.english: Hey! it's a no-no to use my lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 喂喂喂，别用我的口红，那可不行。

sentences.english: Her hands were cold and shaky when she began to redden her lips and run a comb through her hair.
sentences.chinese: 当她开始涂口红和梳理头发时，她的双手冰冷发抖。

sentences.english: Second, your beauty could be improved if you used some rouge and lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 第二，你要是涂点胭脂和口红就更美了。

sentences.english: Ladies, , pick up some red lipstick next time you're at the drug store.
sentences.chinese: 下次去药妆店，女士们可别忘了买点口红。

sentences.english: We know which glass was ours by the lipstick mark.
sentences.chinese: 通过口红印我们就可以知道那个杯子是自己的。

sentences.english: Use a lipstick to paint on a foot so it looks like wearing a red sock.
sentences.chinese: 用口红涂抹在一只脚上，看似穿了一只红袜子。

sentences.english: Keep lipstick on your lips and eliminate feathering and smudging.
sentences.chinese: 保存在你的唇上口红而且除去用羽毛复盖和弄脏。

sentences.english: She worked carefully on her hair, penciled her eyebrows and rouged her lips.
sentences.chinese: 她仔细地梳理着头发，描眉，涂口红。

sentences.english: She powdered her face and applied her lipstick and rouge.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上搽了粉，抹了口红和胭脂。

sentences.english: What's the difference between a hockey mom and a pitbull? Lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 一名会打曲棍球的妈妈和一头公牛有什么区别？口红。

sentences.english: She pulled a lipstick and a mirror from her purse.
sentences.chinese: 简尼特盖好打字机，从钱夹里拿出口红和镜子。

sentences.english: A: Could you buy me a lipstick while you’re shopping tonight?
sentences.chinese: 你今晚去买东西时能顺便给我带支口红吗？

sentences.english: Whats the difference between a hockey mom andapitbull?Lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 一位会打曲棍球的妈妈和一头牤牛有啥子区分？口红。

definition: bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
